item.description:
Let's represent Ron Paul at one of the first straw polls of the season!

[NHGOP event details here]

Suggested donation: $10 per person. To be listed as a sponsor and receive preferred seating, you may donate: Bronze Sponsors: $30 per person, Silver Sponsors: $100 per person, Gold Sponsors: $200 per person.

RSVP by June 2.

To RSVP, email Chris Crawford at chriscra@gwmail.gwu.edu To Pre-pay, send a check to: The New Hampshire Conservative Future PAC, P.O. Box 8121, 245 Daniel Webster Highway #4, Nashua, NH 03060

Note: All exploring and potential candidates for the 2012 Republican nomination for president of the United States have received invitations to speak at this event. We will keep you posted as we receive responses from these candidates in the coming months.

[RSVP on Facebook here]
item.name: "Conservative Future" BBQ and Presidential Straw Poll
